privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: FoodPool ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how our mobile application (the "App") collects, uses, stores, and protects your information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.text: When you create an account, we collect:

bullets.identity: Your email address (used for authentication and account recovery)
bullets.contact: Your full name (displayed only to you and as part of your profile)
bullets.password: Password (stored securely as a hash ‚Äî we never see your actual password)

dataCollection.text2: We also collect data related to your interactions:

bullets2.pools: Pools created, joined, and voting history
bullets2.device: Push notification tokens and device information

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
usage.text: We use your information exclusively to:

bullets.register: Provide the service: Create and manage your account, enable pool creation and voting
bullets.manage: Facilitate anonymous voting: Assign animal avatars for identity-hidden participation
bullets.participate: Send notifications: Alert you about pool updates, voting deadlines, and results
bullets.improve: Improve the App: Understand usage patterns to enhance features and fix issues
bullets.achievements: Award achievements: Track and display earned badges and medals

anonymity.title: 4. Anonymity & Voting Privacy
anonymity.text: Anonymity is central to FoodPool's design:

bullets.noOne: During active polls, no one ‚Äî including pool creators ‚Äî can see who voted for what
bullets.avatar: Your real name is replaced by a random animal avatar in each pool
bullets.voteData: Vote data is associated with your anonymous identity, not your real profile
bullets.afterPoll: After a poll ends, participation is visible but individual vote choices remain anonymous

thirdParties.title: 5. Data Sharing & Third Parties
thirdParties.text: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with any third parties for marketing purposes. Your data may be processed by:

bullets.supabase: Supabase: Our backend infrastructure provider (database, authentication, real-time sync)
bullets.expo: Expo / React Native: Our app development framework (for push notifications)

thirdParties.footer: These service providers process data only as necessary to provide their services.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

bullets.encryption: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS/SSL
bullets.rls: Database access is protected by Row-Level Security (RLS) policies
bullets.passwords: Passwords are hashed and salted ‚Äî they are never stored in plain text
bullets.tokens: Authentication tokens are securely stored on your device

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.text: We retain your data as follows:

bullets.account: Account data: Retained as long as your account is active
bullets.polls: Poll data: Voting history and pool records are retained for your reference
bullets.deleted: Deleted accounts: All associated data is permanently removed within 30 days

bullets.access: Access: View all personal data we hold about you (available in your profile)
bullets.update: Update: Modify your name, email, or profile information at any time
bullets.delete: Delete: Permanently delete your account and all associated data from your profile settings
bullets.optout: Opt-out: Disable push notifications at any time through your device settings

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.text: FoodPool is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make significant changes, we will notify you through the App or via email. The "Last Updated" date at the top of this page will always reflect the most recent revision.

privacyPolicy.footer: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at omrsfylmz@gmail.com
